original_title: Thank You, Del: The Story of the Del Close Marathon
overview: Del Close was never a household name, but any comedy enthusiast is aware of his impact. From Bill Murray to Chris Farley to Amy Poehler, many of the most famous comedians consider him their mentor. Fifteen years after Del Closeâ€™s death, thousands of Improv students, comedy fans, actors, and successful comedians gather to celebrate the most important person in modern comedy that no one knows.
tagline: The funniest person in comedy that no one knows
title: Thank You, Del: The Story of the Del Close Marathon
